author: jvanzyl
msg: - schema to test all JDBC types. make sure that the SQL is generated
correctly and that objects using the underlying types work properly.
so far the results are abysmal. between the poor error reporting in
texen (completely my fault) and the lacklustre mapping between
the types we're pretty much at 10%. not good.
